title: Weibo Trending UGC Scraper Input
description: Input parameters for scraping trending lifestyle-related user-generated content (UGC) posts from Weibo.

max_hashtags.title: Max Trending Hashtags
max_hashtags.description: Maximum number of trending hashtags to fetch from the Weibo Hot Search (1–50).

max_posts_per_hashtag.title: Max Posts per Hashtag
max_posts_per_hashtag.description: Number of posts to scrape for each trending hashtag (1–50).

max_pages.title: Max Pages per Hashtag
max_pages.description: Number of result pages to scrape per hashtag (1–10).

concurrency.title: Concurrency Level
concurrency.description: Number of concurrent requests when scraping posts (1–20).
